You absorb the agony of those in pain. Everytime you attack, there's a chance you may heal up to 2 and a half hearts of health.
ordemparanormal.ability.adrenalina.descr: Your body is abnormally filled with adrenaline during dangerous situations, making you more agile.
ordemparanormal.ability.adrenalina_2.des: Your entire body is able to produce high doses of adrenaline, making you even more agile when hurt.
ordemparanormal.ability.afinidade_conhec: You're connected with the entity of Knowledge, discarding the need for Knowledge ingredients and making you resistant to Knowledge effects, but also weak to Blood effects.
ordemparanormal.ability.afinidade_energi: You're connected with the entity of Energy, discarding the need for Energy ingredients and making you resistant to Energy effects, but also weak to Knowledge effects.
You're connected with the entity of Death, discarding the need for Death ingredients and making you resistant to Death effects, but also weak to Energy effects.
ordemparanormal.ability.afinidade_sangue: You're connected with the entity of Blood, discarding the need for Blood ingredients and making you resistant to Blood effects, but also weak to Death effects.
ordemparanormal.ability.dieta_adaptada.d: Your body adapted to absorb things that once brought you negative effects.
ordemparanormal.ability.dieta_adaptada_2: Your body benefits from consuming grotesque and unhealthy things, giving you positive effects from eating them.
ordemparanormal.ability.flagelo.descript: You exchange your own pain for power, receiving 2 effort points but losing 4 hearts of health.
ordemparanormal.ability.medo_tangivel.de: You learn the ritual Tangible Fear, which you can cast by using this power.
ordemparanormal.ability.potencial_aprimo: You can go past your limits, spending more effort than normal, receiving 2 effort points.
ordemparanormal.ability.punho_enraivecid: Your blood hardens on your hand. When using this power, your next attacks using your fists will deal extra damage.
Your blood hardens permanently on your hands. All your attacks with your fists will deal extra damage.
ordemparanormal.ability.sangue_ferro.des: Your veins are bathed by the paranormal, making you more resistant, providing 2 extra health hearts.
ordemparanormal.ability.sangue_ferro_2.d: Your blood is completely flooded with hate and violence, providing 3 extra health hearts.
Pain awakens feelings inside you that you never thought existed. You deal more damage when hurt
ordemparanormal.ability.sangue_vivo.desc: Your blood is always flowing violently, healing you faster when hurt.
ordemparanormal.ability.vampirismo.descr: You consume the blood of your target, dealing damage to them but healing yourself.
ordemparanormal.ability.vampirismo_2.des: Intensifies the power Vampirism, increasing the healing power and also receiving more speed.
ordemparanormal.devil_church_books.blood: Blood is the entity of emotion. It searches for intensity: pain, obsession, passion, love, hunger, hate - everything that involves feeling an extreme emotion pleases the entity of Blood.
Everything begins with Blood. Blood is the flow that bathes the eternity of the Other Side.
ordemparanormal.mansion_books.record_001:
Day 1: 
Jerome told me this place is safe for my habitation. The first guest told me something horrible... When I was returning from the forest, a fog appeared. It wasn't in my weather predictions... 
He had a big bite on the leg, and didn't want to talk about it...

Day 2: 
WHAT THE FUCK IS THAT?!
ordemparanormal.mansion_books.record_495: Blood brother Lairon came back from his expedition... He said that he found a portal in the supposed "Order's" plains. We recreated it and watched it closely. We will never listen to Lairon again. Damned bastard! At least we got resources from that.
ordemparanormal.nex.title: Paranormal Exposure
ordemparanormal.ritual.amaldicoar_arma.d: Curses the weapon you're holding with knowledge sigils.
ordemparanormal.ritual.aprimoramento_fis: Makes your body reach extraordinary physical conditions, making you more resistant and powerful.
ordemparanormal.ritual.arma_atroz.descri: Makes the weapon you're holding more dangerous.
ordemparanormal.ritual.arma_veloz.descri: Makes the weapon you're holding more swift.
ordemparanormal.ritual.armadura_sangue.d: Uses your blood to harden your skin, serving as armor.
ordemparanormal.ritual.cicatrizacao.desc: Heals the your wounds or your target's.
ordemparanormal.ritual.consumir_manancia: Consumes the surrounding life, fortifying yours.
ordemparanormal.ritual.decadencia.descri: Imbues your next attack with spirals inflict decay.
ordemparanormal.ritual.descarnar.descrip: Skins the target, dealing continuous blood damage.
ordemparanormal.ritual.hemofagia.descrip: Sucks the target's blood, transfering their vitality to you.
ordemparanormal.ritual.lamina_medo.descr: Conjures an impossible flame, a glimpse of something that shouldn't exist, on a blade that starts to deal lethal amounts of damage.
ordemparanormal.ritual.medo_tangivel.des: Your body becomes a manifestation of Fear, making you immune to mundane effects. You become immune to any non-paranormal damage source.
ordemparanormal.ritual.salto_fantasma.de: Teleports  you 10 blocks away in the direction you are looking.
ordemparanormal.ritual.teleporte.descrip: If used while crouching it saves the actual location, and then if used without crouching it teleports you to the saved location.
ordemparanormal.ritual.transferencia_vit: Transfers your vitality to your target.
ordemparanormal.ritual.velocidade_mortal: Alters the time perception of your body, that starts to reach extraordinary speeds.
ordemparanormal.ritual_item.ritual_learn: §7Just an item with a strange symbol.
